definition[0]: a place where an organized meeting, concert etc takes place
example[0]: The first thing to do is book a venue.
example[1]: The band will play  (=perform at) as many  venues as possible.
example[2]: the venue for the latest round of talks
definition[1]: a place where a large event is arranged to take place
example[3]: All parts of theconference venue have access for people with disabilities.
